EmailTemplate.name: 2018 - EMEAI HON Operators Conference.201801_EMEAI_Followup2_HONOperatorsConf_mi
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for attending the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague.
HAPP MPP overview presentation is now available. Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/HAPP_MPP Overview_Prague_Jan2018_v2.pdf]]> to download. All other presentations are available here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/HON_Operators_Conference_Prague_2018.pdf]]>.
This is a friendly reminder to complete the brief online survey regarding our conference. To help us improve our future conferences, please take a few moments to give us some feedback. Your feedback is very important to us. If you have already submitted the survey, we appriciate your feedback!
COMPLETE THE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/W3G5P7S]]>
We look forward to hearing from you.
Thank you, Anna Tomova Customer Support Manager
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/TbZQj0h0o000BIu20qjdGX0]]>
